response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is estimated at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 1400000}
